info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 31 at 7:09PM CDT until March 31 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR WESTERN LEE COUNTY... At 705 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 8 miles southwest of Amboy, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Amboy around 719 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Eldena, Lee Center and Harmon. This includes... Lee County Fairgrounds. Including the following interstate... I-88 between mile markers 62 and 65. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
